meanings.definition: Teeth that are crooked or irregularly shaped.
meanings.sent1: The dentist recommended braces to fix her snaggleteeth.
meanings.sent2: His snaggleteeth made him self-conscious about his smile.
meanings.sent3: Even though he had snaggleteeth, he had a contagious smile.
meanings.sent4: Her snaggleteeth were like a row of misaligned soldiers.
meanings.sent5: The little girl's snaggleteeth sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A person who has crooked or irregularly shaped teeth.
meanings.sent1: The snaggleteeth of the boy were noticeable when he laughed.
meanings.sent2: She felt insecure about being called a snaggleteeth by her classmates.
meanings.sent3: Despite being a snaggleteeth, he had a charming personality.
meanings.sent4: The snaggleteeth of the old man added character to his face.
meanings.sent5: Her snaggleteeth were a unique feature that set her apart.
